```{r, echo=FALSE}
suppressMessages(library(dplyr))
output <- read.table("output", quote="", comment.char = "")
#head(output)
#barplot(head(output, n = 20)$V1, names.arg = head(output, n = 20)$V2, ylab = "Occurences", main = "20 most common words in The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes", las=3)

inputPanel(
  selectInput("n_words", label = "Number of words:",
             choices = c(2, 4, 6, 10, 20), selected = 10),
  sliderInput("length_adjust", label = "Length of word:",
              min = 1, max = 25, value = 1, step = 1)
)

renderPlot({
  #hist(faithful$eruptions, probability = TRUE, breaks = as.numeric(input$n_breaks),
       #xlab = "Duration (minutes)", main = "Geyser eruption duration")
barplot(head(filter(output, nchar(as.character(V2)) >= input$length_adjust), n = input$n_words)$V1, names.arg = head(filter(output, nchar(as.character(V2)) >= input$length_adjust), n = input$n_words)$V2, ylab = "Occurences", main = "Most common words in The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes")

  #dens <- density(faithful$eruptions, adjust = input$bw_adjust)

})
```
